theRetrospect:Overcore.NAME: Overcore
theRetrospect:Overcore.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:Construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}. Be theretrospect:Frozen for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.}

theRetrospect:ChaoticOffense.NAME: Chaotic Offense
theRetrospect:ChaoticOffense.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Play a random attack card from your discard pile, then theretrospect:construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
theRetrospect:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Gain energy equal to the {!M!|@=card's|>1=cards' total} cost.

theRetrospect:Concurrency.NAME: Concurrency
theRetrospect:Concurrency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each timeline you have.

theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.NAME: Tap the Future
theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain [E] [E]. NL Shuffle {!Upgrades!|@=an *Empty|0=a *Void} to your draw pile.

theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Replay your last card this turn.

theRetrospect:AlternativeReality.NAME: Alternative Reality
theRetrospect:AlternativeReality.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:In_timeline, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:ChargeRifle.NAME: Charge Rifle
theRetrospect:ChargeRifle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of ALL Charge Rifle cards by !M! this combat.

theRetrospect:DejaVu.NAME: Déjà vu
theRetrospect:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Permanently increase ALL Déjà vu's Block by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:RewriteHistory.NAME: Rewrite History
theRetrospect:RewriteHistory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your discard pile. Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:QuickThinker.NAME: Quick Thinker
theRetrospect:QuickThinker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:UnstableChronology.NAME: Unstable Chronology
theRetrospect:UnstableChronology.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Cost 1 less [E] for each time you take damage in this combat. NL theretrospect:Construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:Paradox.NAME: Paradox
theRetrospect:Paradox.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL You cannot play any cards when your hand is full.

theRetrospect:Shortcut.NAME: Shortcut
theRetrospect:Shortcut.DESCRIPTION: Timelines require !M! % less HP to construct.

theRetrospect:LightspeedLeap.NAME: Lightspeed Leap
theRetrospect:LightspeedLeap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Only playable if you have played at least !M! card{!M!|>1=s} this turn. theretrospect:Construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
theRetrospect:FastForward.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard up to !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:WarmUp.NAME: Warm Up
theRetrospect:WarmUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain Dexterity equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:Telekinesis.NAME: Telekinesis
theRetrospect:Telekinesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage ignoring the enemy's Block.

theRetrospect:Recollection.NAME: Recollection
theRetrospect:Recollection.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Copy !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand. {!M!|@=It costs|>1=They cost} 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Card to Copy into Your Hand.
Cards to Copy into Your Hand.

theRetrospect:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
theRetrospect:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}For every !M! card{!M!|>1=s} in your draw pile, deal !D! damage.

theRetrospect:HatTrick.NAME: Hat Trick
theRetrospect:HatTrick.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile into your hand.

theRetrospect:BlindStrike.NAME: Blind Strike
theRetrospect:BlindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.

theRetrospect:Evanescence.NAME: Evanescence
theRetrospect:Evanescence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status card, gain !M! Block.

theRetrospect:SoullessDemon.NAME: Soulless Demon
theRetrospect:SoullessDemon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose 1 Strength.

theRetrospect:NoxiousWraith.NAME: Noxious Wraith
theRetrospect:NoxiousWraith.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Intangible. NL Lose !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:DefectiveEcho.NAME: Defective Echo
theRetrospect:DefectiveEcho.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Next turn, you first {!M!|1=card is|>1=!M! cards are|@=!M! card is} played twice.

theRetrospect:Singularity.NAME: Singularity
theRetrospect:Singularity.DESCRIPTION: This card is forever stuck to your hand.

theRetrospect:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theRetrospect:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=Ethereal. NL }All timeline cards theretrospect:construct !M! extra timeline{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:UnceasingStrike.NAME: Unceasing Strike
theRetrospect:UnceasingStrike.DESCRIPTION: End your turn. NL theretrospect:In_timeline: Deal !D! damage.

theRetrospect:RecursiveAffinity.NAME: Recursive Affinity
theRetrospect:RecursiveAffinity.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL {!Upgrades!|0=|@=Retain. NL }Replay your last 2 cards this turn.

theRetrospect:DeathTotem.NAME: Death Totem
theRetrospect:DeathTotem.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! % HP. Prevent death for 1 round. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:Converge.NAME: Converge
theRetrospect:Converge.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:Collapse all timelines. Gain [E] and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} for each timeline theretrospect:collapsed. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:SelfCorrection.NAME: Self Correction
theRetrospect:SelfCorrection.DESCRIPTION: Remove any number of cards from a timeline.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose Any Number of Cards to Remove.

theRetrospect:KineticEnergy.NAME: Kinetic Energy
theRetrospect:KineticEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E].

theRetrospect:ShatteringBurst.NAME: Shattering Burst
theRetrospect:ShatteringBurst.DESCRIPTION: Repeat !M! times, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theRetrospect:FractalBlade.NAME: Fractal Blade
theRetrospect:FractalBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Can be upgraded any number of times.

theRetrospect:Anamnesis.NAME: Anamnesis
theRetrospect:Anamnesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each timeline theretrospect:constructed this combat.

theRetrospect:AssetProcurement.NAME: Asset Procurement
theRetrospect:AssetProcurement.DESCRIPTION: Add a random colourless card to your hand.

theRetrospect:SynchronizedReflex.NAME: Synchronized Reflex
theRetrospect:SynchronizedReflex.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, theretrospect:accelerate !M! random timeline{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:DimensionalRift.NAME: Dimensional Rift
theRetrospect:DimensionalRift.DESCRIPTION: When you are about to die, theretrospect:collapse the timeline with the most HP.

theRetrospect:VanishingTrick.NAME: Vanishing Trick
theRetrospect:VanishingTrick.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Replay your last card this turn.

theRetrospect:RecursionHell.NAME: Recursion Hell
theRetrospect:RecursionHell.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Play 1 *Recursion *Hell.

theRetrospect:Enigma.NAME: Enigma
theRetrospect:Enigma.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of *Paradox in exhaust pile.

theRetrospect:Concoction.NAME: Concoction
theRetrospect:Concoction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, NL !M! Dexterity, NL and 1 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:SmartHammer.NAME: Smart Hammer
theRetrospect:SmartHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card in your discard pile to upgrade for this combat.

theRetrospect:MasterOfDeception.NAME: Master Of Deception
theRetrospect:MasterOfDeception.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you theretrospect:construct a timeline, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theRetrospect:ConcertedBlast.NAME: Concerted Blast
theRetrospect:ConcertedBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=|@=Retain. NL }Deal damage equal to the total number of cards in all timelines.

theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.NAME: Into The Void
theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Timelines cost 1 HP to theretrospect:construct this turn.

theRetrospect:TheBestDefense.NAME: The Best Defense
theRetrospect:TheBestDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This round, return all blocked damage to enemies.

theRetrospect:SpeedIsLife.NAME: Speed Is Life
theRetrospect:SpeedIsLife.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=|@=Retain. NL }This round, heal !M! HP whenever you play a card.

theRetrospect:UnceasingSprint.NAME: Unceasing Sprint
theRetrospect:UnceasingSprint.DESCRIPTION: {@@}End your turn. NL theretrospect:In_timeline: theretrospect:Accelerate !M! random timeline{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:ChaoticDefense.NAME: Chaotic Defense
theRetrospect:ChaoticDefense.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Play a random skill card from your draw pile, then theretrospect:construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
theRetrospect:Rewind.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Replay your last card this turn.

theRetrospect:ExponentialBlast.NAME: Exponential Blast
theRetrospect:ExponentialBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Lose {!Upgrades!|0=[E] [E] [E]|@=[E] [E]}. NL Deal damage equal to 2 to the power of remaining energy count. NL Exhaust.
